Specifications

Field Type Flags Description
credit_notes Related Readonly Nullable List of all credit notes of the group
down_payment_invoices Related Readonly Nullable List of all down-payment invoices of the group
id Objectid Readonly Unique identifier of the resource
invoice Reference Readonly Nullable Invoice of the group
invoices_cancelled Related Readonly Nullable List of all cancelled invoices of the group
purchase_order Reference Readonly Nullable Purchase order of the group
quotation Reference Readonly Nullable Quotation of the group
resource_uri String Readonly URI which represent a specific resource. All references are based upon this scheme
